item.title: Vancouver Island Road Trip
item.description:
Vancouver Island Road Trip

Back on the road, we headed to Honeymoon Bay on Lake Cowichan. For a short while the ride was heaven on Hwy 18. But then we turned off and ended up on DH49 Duncan - Lake Cowichan. It was ok at best, and plain nasty at its worst.

item.title: The Great Barrier Reef's Best Hope Is a Killer Robot
item.description:
The Great Barrier Reef's Best Hope Is a Killer Robot

Crown-of-thorns starfish are the zombies of the sea. They won't die even if you cut them in half. To kill one, you must dismember it completely-or inject it with poisonous (to them) bile salts. Instead of braaains, these zombies munch coral, and off the coast of Australia, infestations of the beasts are damaging the Great Barrier Reef at an alarming rate.

item.title: Treehouse Chocolate's Four Drinking Chocolates
item.description:
Treehouse Chocolate's Four Drinking Chocolates

Winter may be officially over in the Northern Hemisphere, but that doesn't mean hot chocolate has to disappear from people's radar until temperatures cool again. For some of us, it makes for a viable alternative to coffee in the morning-with some serious sugar and cocoa kick.

item.title: Why Sleep Is So Important For Overall Health
item.description:
Why Sleep Is So Important For Overall Health

Around the world, human beings have sleep deficit. Learn why getting the right amount of rest can revitalize your body and lead to overall increase in health and wellness. With an estimated 60 million Americans suffering from insomnia, sleep is something many of us are lacking.

item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.

item.title: Unsplash | Free High Resolution Photos
item.description:
Unsplash | Free High Resolution Photos

Do whatever you want free high-resolution photos. Download 10 new free photos every 10 days.

item.title: Portraits of Dogs as They Shake Off Water
item.description:
Portraits of Dogs as They Shake Off Water

For her series " Shake", pet photographer Carli Davidson photographed curious portraits of dogs shaking off water. Use a fast shutter speed and you can capture all kinds of strange expressions on your dog's face. You can find the rest of the photographs in the series here.
